2403.verse: ۞ مِنْهَا|From it|102|125|246$خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ|We created you,|131|176|5846$وَفِيهَا|and in it|74|119|6329$نُعِيدُكُمْ|We will return you,|145|190|11467$وَمِنْهَا|and from it|92|115|6331$نُخْرِجُكُمْ|We will bring you out,|164|257|11468$تَارَةً|time|60|246|11469$أُخْرَىٰ|another.|80|173|4392$

2404.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And verily,|90|96|640$أَرَيْنَـٰهُ|We showed him|123|136|11470$ءَايَـٰتِنَا|Our Signs,|88|101|1344$كُلَّهَا|all of them,|95|108|329$فَكَذَّبَ|but he denied|111|124|11471$وَأَبَىٰ|and refused.|103|110|11472$

2405.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|83|309$أَجِئْتَنَا|"Have you come to us|166|187|6516$لِتُخْرِجَنَا|to drive us out|118|139|11473$مِنْ|of|50|71|53$أَرْضِنَا|our land|85|106|9552$بِسِحْرِكَ|with your magic,|130|140|11474$يَـٰمُوسَىٰ|O Musa?|98|98|523$

2406.verse: فَلَنَأْتِيَنَّكَ|Then we will surely produce for you|256|274|11475$بِسِحْرٍ|magic|78|113|6691$مِّثْلِهِۦ|like it.|72|107|221$فَٱجْعَلْ|So make|82|117|9643$بَيْنَنَا|between us|97|114|2964$وَبَيْنَكَ|and between you|135|146|11476$مَوْعِدًا|an appointment,|128|149|10828$لَّا|not|42|63|30$نُخْلِفُهُۥ|we will fail it|102|123|11477$نَحْنُ|[we]|62|83|103$وَلَآ|and not|71|92|25$أَنتَ|you,|58|69|341$مَكَانًا|(in) a place|96|350|5091$سُوًى|even."|71|325|11478$

2407.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|96|309$مَوْعِدُكُمْ|"Your appointment|142|188|11479$يَوْمُ|(is on the) day|119|165|5399$ٱلزِّينَةِ|(of) the festival,|130|176|11480$وَأَن|and that|77|100|1470$يُحْشَرَ|will be assembled|134|217|11481$ٱلنَّاسُ|the people|90|256|112$ضُحًى|(at) forenoon."|119|202|6634$

2410.verse: فَتَنَـٰزَعُوٓاْ|Then they disputed|149|181|11488$أَمْرَهُم|(in) their affair|117|181|9289$بَيْنَهُمْ|among them,|106|170|1056$وَأَسَرُّواْ|and they kept secret|160|192|8191$ٱلنَّجْوَىٰ|the private conversation.|188|188|11489$

2400.verse: [Moses] said, "The knowledge thereof is with my Lord in a record. My Lord neither errs nor forgets."

2401.verse: [It is He] who has made for you the earth as a bed [spread out] and inserted therein for you roadways and sent down from the sky, rain and produced thereby categories of various plants.

2402.verse: Eat [therefrom] and pasture your livestock. Indeed, in that are signs for those of intelligence.

2403.verse: From the earth We created you, and into it We will return you, and from it We will extract you another time.

2404.verse: And We certainly showed Pharaoh Our signs - all of them - but he denied and refused.

2405.verse: He said, "Have you come to us to drive us out of our land with your magic, O Moses?

2406.verse: Then we will surely bring you magic like it, so make between us and you an appointment, which we will not fail to keep and neither will you, in a place assigned."

2407.verse: [Moses] said, "Your appointment is on the day of the festival when the people assemble at mid-morning."

2408.verse: So Pharaoh went away, put together his plan, and then came [to Moses].

2409.verse: Moses said to the magicians summoned by Pharaoh, "Woe to you! Do not invent a lie against Allah or He will exterminate you with a punishment; and he has failed who invents [such falsehood]."

2410.verse: So they disputed over their affair among themselves and concealed their private conversation.

2411.verse: They said, "Indeed, these are two magicians who want to drive you out of your land with their magic and do away with your most exemplary way.

2412.verse: So resolve upon your plan and then come [forward] in line. And he has succeeded today who overcomes."
